summary: Complete testing of Push Notification System features. All 20 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend testing confirms user registration, login, and characters page work correctly. Notification scheduler confirmed running in backend logs.
passed_tests: Backend - VAPID public key endpoint returns valid key
Backend - User signup returns token
Backend - User has valid ID after signup
Backend - Push subscribe requires authentication (401 without auth)
Backend - Push subscribe works with valid auth token
Backend - Push unsubscribe requires authentication (401 without auth)
Backend - Push unsubscribe works with valid auth token
Backend - Get preferences returns default values (enabled=true, frequency=medium)
Backend - Update preferences works
Backend - Verify updated preferences persisted in database
Backend - Generate notification (random type) works
Backend - Generate notification (inactivity type) works
Backend - Notification respects disabled preferences
Backend - Get notification history returns list
Backend - Check inactivity endpoint returns inactive_users list
Backend - Update activity with auth works
Backend - Update activity without auth silently succeeds
Backend - Get characters returns list (25+ characters)
Backend - Get characters by category filter works (Girls, Anime, Guys)
Backend - Scheduler confirmed running in logs
Frontend - Landing page loads correctly with navigation
Frontend - User registration form works
Frontend - User login redirects to characters page
Frontend - Characters page shows all 3 category tabs (Girls, Anime, Guys)
Frontend - Category tabs switch content correctly
Frontend - Character cards display with images, names, occupations, traits

test_credentials.test_users_created: Multiple test_* users created during testing (test_push_*, test_sub_*, test_prefs_*, etc.)

seed_data_creation: Test users created with various TEST_ prefixes for push notification testing

mocked_apis.revenue_data: Revenue tab in admin dashboard uses simulated data (from previous testing)

scheduler_status.log_evidence: Notification scheduler started messages found in backend logs at multiple timestamps

context_for_next_testing_agent: Push notification system fully tested. Scheduler runs every 2 hours for random notifications and every 4 hours for inactivity notifications. VAPID keys configured in backend/.env. All push endpoints require Bearer token auth except vapid-public-key and preferences GET. Frontend notification hook at /src/hooks/useNotifications.js handles subscription flow.
